Macro Definition Documentation

#define DSP_EMA_I16_ALPHA (   x)    ( (u8)(x * 255) )

Macro for creating the alpha avelu for 16-bit calculations.

See DSP_EMA_I32_ALPHA for details

#define DSP_EMA_I32_ALPHA (   x)    ( (u16)(x * 65535) )

Macro for creating the alpha value for 32-bit calculations.

This value can be set between 0.0 and 1.0. More weight is given to older samples when the valeu is close to 0.0. When the value is set to 1.0, no averaging occurs.
